channel.title: React Navigation Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest React Navigation news and events.

item.title: React Navigation 1.0 (goodbye, beta!)
item.description: As of today, React Navigation version 1.0 has been released! To see a list of recent improvements leading up to the release, refer to the “[Renewed Path to React Navigation V1.0](https://github.com/react-navigation/react-navigation/issues/2585)” issu
